mapper.select: SELECT B.BID, B.BNAME, B.BOPEN_STATUS, B.BINTRO, B.CID, C.CNAME, MB.COUNTMBBID, P.EDIT_NAME FROM( SELECT MB.BID AS MBBID ,COUNT(MB.BID) AS COUNTMBBID FROM MEMBER_BAND MB GROUP BY MB.BID ) MB JOIN BAND B ON(B.BID = MB.MBBID) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(B.CID = C.CID) JOIN PROFILE P ON(P.BID = B.BID) WHERE B.BOPEN_STATUS != 'PRV' AND P.FTYPE = 2 AND B.BSTATUS = 'Y' AND C.CNAME = UPPER(#{kind}) ORDER BY B.BID
